VLIB_legendreMoments_Init

Detailed Description


Functions

void VLIB_legendreMoments_Init (int16_t LPoly[], int32_t Order, int32_t ImH, int16_t *Factor)

Function Documentation

void VLIB_legendreMoments_Init ( int16_t  LPoly[],
int32_t  Order,
int32_t  ImH,
int16_t *  Factor 
)

Description
This function can be called just once to initialize the necessary buffers and constants.
Parameters:
[out] LPoly[] Buffer to hold the computed Legendre polynomial values (SQ0.15)
[in] Order Required order of moments (SQ31.0)
[in] ImH Image height (SQ31.0)
[out] *Factor Pointer to variable (SQ0.15)
Assumptions
  • The largest order of moments supported is 40.
  • LPoly is independent of the pixel intensities, and is dependent only on the size of the image (ImH) and the Order of the moment values required
  • LPoly must be of dimension (Order+1)x(ImH)
  • LPoly must be aligned on a 4 byte boundary
  • The ImH parameter should be a multiple of 4.
Benchmarks:
See VLIB_Test_Report.html for cycle and memory information.
